item.description:
Looking for something fun to do on New Year's Eve and a fun group of people to hang out with? Then join us for the NYE Resolution Ball at the Seaport Hotel, Boston.

Please note- there are different options on the website for the NYE event- we will be going to the "party only" portion which starts at 9pm. The grand celebration will feature the Felix Brown Band and NYC DJ Samuel L., dancing, midnight toast, and party favors. It is black tie optional.

To get your tickets visit: http://www.bostoneven...


Tix must be purchased in advance. There is a special running of only $49 until the end of the day on Cyber Monday. Prices go up as the event gets closer, so get yours soon!

We will meet inside the main entrance to the ballroom. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

Look forward to seeing you for an awesome night ringing in the new year!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside event ballroom- near ticket entrance. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: New Year's Eve Resolution Ball, Boston. Discounted Tix!
